events.name: KopiJS #45
events.location: Lowercase, Blk D #01-01, 1 McNally St, Singapore 187940

events.name: Fast Forward: Transforming Transport
events.description:
There is a huge amount of talk in the media and tech-industry about the future of transport. Big industry players and disruptive tech companies alike are investing in technologies that are likely to transform our journeys!
Join us for an evening exploring some of the exciting developments in transport… from driverless cars, or Connected and Autonomous Vehicles (CAVs), to novel modes of transport such as the Hyperloop.
Besides the talks, there will be food and the opportunity to network with other attendees.
You don’t need to be an expert to attend; just an interest in future technologies is enough.
So bring yourselves, your friends and family – and get ready to discover the tech that’s transforming transport.

Who should attend?Anyone with an interest in the future of transportPeople working in the transport sector or with an interest in transportThose who are working on or have an interest in the Hyperloop or Autonomous VehiclesAnyone who wants to learn more about how technology will impact the future

Why attend?
Gain an insight into the future of transportLearn about new cutting edge technologyNetwork with transport figures and peers in your fieldAsk your questions directly to the speakers

For more information see www.iet.org/yp-event
events.location: PSB Academy City Campus, 6 Raffles Boulevard, ##03-200, Singapore 039594
events.group_name: The Institution of Engineering and Technology
